name: olivecss
description: A lightweight plugin and preprocessor that transforms comments into CSS classes and inline styles.
author: Mun Jaehyeon

scripts.test.unit: run-p test.unit.react test.unit.vue test.unit.svelte test.unit.astro test.unit.preact test.unit.solid test.unit.lit test.babel
scripts.test.unit.react: cross-env FRAMEWORK=react npm run test.base -- unit.react
scripts.test.unit.vue: cross-env FRAMEWORK=vue npm run test.base -- unit.vue
scripts.test.unit.svelte: cross-env FRAMEWORK=svelte npm run test.base -- unit.svelte
scripts.test.unit.astro: cross-env FRAMEWORK=astro npm run test.base -- unit.astro
scripts.test.unit.preact: cross-env FRAMEWORK=preact npm run test.base -- unit.preact
scripts.test.unit.solid: cross-env FRAMEWORK=solid npm run test.base -- unit.solid
scripts.test.unit.lit: cross-env FRAMEWORK=lit npm run test.base -- unit.lit
scripts.watch.unit: run-p watch.unit.react watch.unit.vue watch.unit.svelte watch.unit.astro watch.unit.preact watch.unit.solid watch.unit.lit watch.babel
scripts.watch.unit.react: cross-env FRAMEWORK=react npm run watch.base -- unit.react
scripts.watch.unit.vue: cross-env FRAMEWORK=vue npm run watch.base -- unit.vue
scripts.watch.unit.svelte: cross-env FRAMEWORK=svelte npm run watch.base -- unit.svelte
scripts.watch.unit.astro: cross-env FRAMEWORK=astro npm run watch.base -- unit.astro
scripts.watch.unit.preact: cross-env FRAMEWORK=preact npm run watch.base -- unit.preact
scripts.watch.unit.solid: cross-env FRAMEWORK=solid npm run watch.base -- unit.solid
scripts.watch.unit.lit: cross-env FRAMEWORK=lit npm run watch.base -- unit.lit
